definitions.definition: a person who lives somewhere permanently or on a long-term basis.
examples: inhabitant, local, citizen, native; Moretownsfolk, townspeople; householder, homeowner, occupier, tenant; formaldenizen "the residents of Ivoryton"Moretownsfolk, townspeople; householder, homeowner, occupier, tenant; denizen the residents of Ivoryton

definitions.definition: a bird, butterfly, or other animal of a species that does not migrate.
a person who boards at a boarding school.
a British government agent in any semi-independent state, especially the governor general's agent at the court of an Indian state.
a medical graduate engaged in specialized practice under supervision in a hospital.
